about.title: 私について・
about.paragraph: Coming from a marketing background, I transitioned into frontend development driven by my passion for creating engaging websites and apps that captivate users and guide them effortlessly. I'm continuously exploring design trends and using new technologies.

tools.title: よく使うツール・
tools.subtitle: My current go-to stack for building modern websites and applications, got some more up my sleeve.

journey.title: My journey.
journey.subtitle: My journey from being a finance-wannabe to a developer
journey.frontendDeveloperDescription: Hard grinded to learn the depths of programming
journey.marketingExecutiveDescription: Experienced the power of good UI/UX
journey.financeInternDescription: Entered the world of coding with VBA

projects.title: Projects.
